DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis is that surgery is of benefit in locally advanced NSCLC with N2 disease. Patients are randomised to surgery or not.
DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Plus/Minus Surgery in Non-Small-Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Stage IIIA/N2
DOC.detailed_description: Patients are after staging randomised to neoadj. chemotherapy followed by surgery followed by irradiation or to chemotherapy followed by irradiation. Endpoint is survival.
DOC.criteria: Histologically verified NSCLC Stage IIIA/N2 age 1875 Lung function test allowing surgery Mediastinoscopy performed Prior chemotherapy Prior irradiation
